bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with xiao chuan 哮喘 , roaring panting. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wo luo 蝸螺 quotes Zhai xuan fang 摘玄方 : 小兒哮疾：向南牆上年久螺螄為末，日晡時以水調成，日落 時舉手合掌皈依，吞之效 , “ Roaring ailment of children: Remove snail shells from an old wall facing south and grind to a powder. Mix the powder with water in the late afternoon. At sundown have [the child] raise its hands and put both palms together as is done in Buddhist religious ceremonies. Have [the child] swallow it and it will be effective”.
